title: Drawing, "International Casino: Floor Plans", 1934
markings: Office stamp in lower right corner in black ink: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY.
inscribed: Labeling of elevations and plans throughout drawing, including some materials. Office stamp in lower right corner, in graphite: 546-74; scale: 1/4" = 1'0"; middle box: LYKOS/ 6/28/34.
description: Floor plan and elevations for the International Casino. Drawings include north elevation, elevation of  Broadway entrance, south elevation, men's ante rooms, ladies restrooms, typical window elevations, coat room, lobby, theater entrance, lobby entrance, foyer, and mezzanines. Indication of various materials on north elevation, and Broadway entrance.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "International Casino: Floor Plans", 1934.
1934. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-319.
